欥字的基本解释

欥
yù
古同“遹”，句首助词，虚用，无实义。

欥
yì
辞。又作“喜”解。

欥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》餘律切，入術，以。］
［《廣韻》夷質切，入質，以。］
承上文词旨的句首助词。

欥字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　欥； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页566第13
【唐韻】餘律切【集韻】允律切，?音聿。【說文】詮詞也。【徐曰】詮，理也，理其事之詞也。引《詩》欥求厥寧。○按今《詩·大雅》本作遹，朱註：遹與聿同。又《班固·幽通賦》欥中龢爲庶幾，顏與冉又不得。師古曰：欥，古聿字。聿，由也。由中和之道，庶幾免於禍難。　又【集韻】弋質切，音逸。義同。一曰喜也。　本从曰，俗从日，非。与日部欥字编码同。

備考：【篇韻】音歡。【字彙補】與欠部欥字不同。《欠部》欥yù，詮詞。
欥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
欥字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhi
Basic explanation of words
Zhi
yù
In ancient times, "Yun", the auxiliary word at the beginning of the sentence, is imaginary and has no real meaning.
Zhi
yì
Resignation. Also made a "happy" solution.
Zhi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guang Yun" Yu Lv cut, into the operation, to. ]
["Guangyun" barbarians cut into the quality, to the quality. ]
Auxiliary word at the beginning of the sentence that inherits the above words.

[Chen Jixia] [Department of Own Words] 　欥; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 566 No. 13
[Tang Yun] Yu Luqie [Jiyun] Yun Luqie,? Yin Yu. [Said Wen] Interpretation of words also. [Xu Yue] Interpretation, rationality, and rationality of words. Quoting "Poetry" for Jue Ning. ○According to today's "Poetry·Daya", this is the 遹, Zhu Note: 遹 and 避 are the same. In "Ban Gu·You Tong Fu", Ji Zhonghe is a Shu Ji, but Yan and Ran can't. Master Gu said: "He", the word "Gu Yu". Yu, you also. By the way of neutralization, you will be saved from misfortune.　[Jiyun] The quality is cut and the sound is easy. The same meaning. One said hi also.　The original is from the saying, the vulgar is from the day, and it is not. Same as the Japanese character code. Remarks: [Pian Yun] Yin Huan. 【Word Supplement】Different from the owe word. "Liao Bu" 欥yù, interpretation of words.
